德甲今晨爆出驚人消息，上任哈化柏林教練一職短短76日嘅奇連士文，突然宣布劈炮唔撈，佢喺上個月先至使咗7,600萬歐元買人，突然辭職真係令球迷O晒嘴。

奇連士文其中一個敗筆，可能就係用2,700萬歐元收購波蘭射手比亞迪克！呢位前鋒雖然射術一流，不過就相當「邪門」，有統計顯示，比亞迪克過去20個月，先後目送5個主帥下台。

比亞迪克喺2018年6月加盟熱拿亞，4個月之後(10月)教練巴拉甸尼被炒，接任人祖歷教多2個月(12月)亦下台；比亞迪克2019年1月轉會AC米蘭，同樣係踢4個月後(5月)就睇住教練加度素被炒魷，同年10月再有接任人甘保羅丟飯碗；今年1月比亞迪克過檔哈化柏林，估唔到只係對咗奇連士文1個月又拜拜，你話係咪邪到爆？

replies.msg: 容艾辛

AC Milan have already started contacts with Eintracht Frankfurt to discuss the purchase of Ante Rebic, a report claims, with Fiorentina watching on closely.

After a difficult start to life at Milan up until Christmas, the Croatia international has exploded since the turn of the year, netting six goals in all competitions including three match winning goals in Serie A.


As a result, multiple reports are claiming that the Rossoneri understandably want to turn Rebic’s two-year loan at San Siro into something more permanent.

According to the latest from Tuttosport – as cited by MilanLive – Milan have begun talks with the Bundesliga side over a potential deal, and Fiorentina is very interested in the talks as they will earn 50% of the agreed amount.

La Viola sold Rebic to Frankfurt in the summer of 2018 for about €2million and had a clause included in the agreement that allowed him to collect half of the amount of the future resale.

Therefore, if Eintracht sells the 26-year-old for €25-30million, Fiorentina will stand to make more than €10m+.

In the meantime, if André Silva scores enough between now and the end of the season then the idea of a swap deal cannot be ruled out either.
